titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (S. 3307) to reauthorize child nutrition programs, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 111-665, by Mr. McGovern.
The resolution waives all points of order against consideration of the bill except those arising under clause 9 of rule XXI.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 248.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 1742.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 232 - 180 (Roll no. 587).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 230 - 174 (Roll no. 588).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 11/30/2010--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (S. 3307) to reauthorize child nutrition programs.
